attributes.additional_details:
WE CAN SAVE THE BEES BUT WE HAVE TO WORK TOGETHER.
LETS NOT STAND BY AND WATCH THEM BECOME EXTINCT!
HELP KEEP THEM ALIVE. HELP OUR PLANET REMAIN IN NATURAL ORDER. In the 1950’s there were over 50 native species of bee in the UK.. now there are just 25!! Pesticides, insecticides and disease are causing a rapid decrease in the population of these cute little creatures of the earth and it is not right!! lets stop this now! WE NEED BEES. #lovebees#lovehoney#savethebees#life#health#love#peace.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for clear, specific action by the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition about a specific policy which would you think would support UK bee populations, or stop a policy which harms them. Alternatively, you might like to sign this petition, which we think is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/128214
